Package de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IServerCampaign
    Not in use.
    IServerContexDemon
    Manipulation of the questions(documents) per filter definition.
    IServerEmailCheck
    Used in the requeue cancelation thread.
    IServerEmailDemon
    This methods are called if the mails are fetched.
    IServerEscalationDemon
    This methods are called if email is escalated
    IServerEventPerformer
    Make it possible for client to invoke methods on server.
    IServerFilter
    The functions are used in the filter process.
    IServerMonitor
    Is used in connection with eMails which are monitored.
    IServerMultiChannel
    The functions are used if the email will be received
    IServerMXAction
    Not in use.
    IServerObjectsControl
    Contains store, delete and load functions for main objects like customers, cases, questions ...
    IServerSystem
    This methods are called if client and server are communicated.

    Class Description
    IServerSystem.PropertyKey
